full_summary:
===============

**Defence Construction Canada – Request for Proposals (RFP) for Smart Building Program – Quebec Region**

**Project Reference:** PW-23-01025825

**Project Title:** Smart Building Program – Regional Standing Offer, Quebec Region

**Publication Date:** February 13, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** April 17, 2023, 14:00:00 (EST)

**Objective:**
The objective of this Request for Proposals (RFP) is to select a Contractor to establish a Regional Standing Offer with Defence Construction Canada (DCC) to provide services on an “as and when required” basis to a maximum estimated value of $1,400,000.00, for a period of two (2) years from the date of establishment.

**Scope of Work:**
The Contractor will provide services specific to Department of National Defence (DND) requirements for locations in Quebec. The services include, but are not limited to, installation, maintenance, and repair of building automation and control systems, energy efficiency technology, and other related work.

**Security Requirements:**
The Contractor must comply with the security requirements outlined in the RFP document.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The evaluation will be based on the requirements outlined in the RFP document. The selection criteria include, but are not limited to, the Contractor’s experience, qualifications, and quality of their proposal.

**Timeline:**

* Contract establishment: Two (2) years from the date of establishment
* Contract call-ups: Valued between $75,000.00 and $500,000.00
* Potential contract extension: Up to three (3) additional one-year periods, with an increase in value of $200,000.00 per year

**Procurement Method:**
This procurement is a Competitive – Open Bidding process.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:

Amanda Eid
Defence Construction Canada
E-mail: amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
Phone: 343-540-6713
